title: Your shop skins questions FOR A FRIEND
body:
Yea, i just specified it'a for a friend, so don't change anything on my side. 

Is it possible to view the next your shop and then ask support for the previous ones? Or you have to tell them before opening it?

Is it possible to only ask for 2 skins and the rest ones to get replaced?

replies.body: It looks like there was an issue, and the original options were replaced.  If your friend missed something he wanted it, have hit reach out in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our team can look into honoring the original shop items for him.
